title: Amarillo police respond to serious traffic crash at I-40 and Western
excerpt: People are asked to find a different route Wednesday, as traffic will be backed up for a while.
text: Kristina Wood, Amarillo Globe-NewsUpdated Wed, March 19, 2025 at 9:27 PM UTCThis story has been updated with additional information. The Amarillo Police Department sent out a traffic advisory Wednesday afternoon, asking people to avoid the area at eastbound Interstate 40 and Western, where officers are working at the scene of a serious traffic crash.Police asked motorists to find a different route, as traffic will be backed up for a while. html:
Kristina Wood, Amarillo Globe-News

Updated Wed, March 19, 2025 at 9:27 PM UTC

This story has been updated with additional information.

The Amarillo Police Department sent out a traffic advisory Wednesday afternoon, asking people to avoid the area at eastbound Interstate 40 and Western, where officers are working at the scene of a serious traffic crash.

Police asked motorists to find a different route, as traffic will be backed up for a while. APD said they will advise when they have cleared the scene of the crash.

This is a developing story; more information will be added as it becomes available.

This article originally appeared on Amarillo Globe-News: Amarillo police working scene of serious crash at I-40 and Western
